{"step_by_step_thinking": "The drug of choice for Rheumatic fever prophylaxis in penicillin allergic patients is usually a macrolide antibiotic. Erythromycin is a macrolide antibiotic and is a suitable option for prophylaxis in penicillin allergic patients. Clindamycin is also an alternative option for penicillin allergic patients. Vancomycin and Gentamycin are not typically used for Rheumatic fever prophylaxis in penicillin allergic patients.", "answer_choice": "A. Erythromycin"}
